Summary: Blinking starlike object moving in circular and back/forth pattern.
trends: There have been 40 other sightings in Dayton
There were no other sightings in Dayton on or around June 19th 2010
divs: Sighting DetailsLooking at stars tonight, noticed one that moved back and forth, and in small circle. Did this for about ten minutes...so I am reporting it. LAST NIGHT, while star-gazing, my husband and I noticed in the sky an object moving like a boomerang, back and forth, and made 90 degree turn and went directly South and disappeared.
